message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Your share loses value quickly, Alice. Let's be fair to both of us this round.
Bob, my friend, you drive a hard bargain!  But let's be realistic, this is the last round where I can accept anything less than $55.  Take it now before we both lose out!
